subject: Connectors: full discovery should replace minimal help-only cache
description: Root cause: ConnectorBridge.fastDiscover/populateCache caches minimal connectors (only help) and discover() never runs discoverConnector/parseHelpOutput. Make full discovery actually run --help and parse commands; treat help-only cache as stale or add force/full option. Update terminal handleLoadCommands to call full discovery. Bump cache version or add discoveryLevel flag to invalidate minimal caches.
